review_title: misleading product description — not as advertised
review_text:
i purchased this tv based on the product description, which stated it was an android tv. however, what i received was entirely different — a sluggish, non-android operating system with extremely limited functionality. setting up apps was a nightmare, and several buttons on the remote didn't work at all.

the experience was frustrating and disappointing. i had no choice but to return the product and now have to wait for a refund. this is not what i expected from a supposedly modern smart tv. strongly urge others to verify product details with the seller before purchasing.
